Variables
SharpNeat.​Neat.​Genome
namespace SharpNeat.Neat.Genome
ConnectionGenesUtils
internal static
ConnectionGenesUtils

Static utility methods related to connection genes.

Functions
CreateHiddenNodeIdArray
public static int[] CreateHiddenNodeIdArray(
DirectedConnection[] connArr,
int inputOutputCount,
HashSet<int> workingIdSet
)

Create a sorted array of hidden node IDs.

Parameters
connArr
DirectedConnection[]

An array of directed connections from which to extract/determine the hidden node IDs.

inputOutputCount
int

The number of input and output nodes. Hidden node IDs start after these nodes.

workingIdSet
HashSet<int>

A working/reusable hashset. This is cleared and re-populated with the hidden nodes IDs before returning.

Returns

A new array that contains all of the hidden node IDs, sorted in ascending order.

ValidateHiddenNodeIds
public static bool ValidateHiddenNodeIds(
int[] hiddenNodeIdArr,
DirectedConnection[] connArr,
int inputOutputCount
)

Validation tests on an array of hidden node IDs and an associated array of connections.

Parameters
hiddenNodeIdArr
int[]

Array of hidden node IDs.

connArr
DirectedConnection[]

Array of connections.

inputOutputCount
int

The total number of input and output nodes.

Returns

true if the provided data is valid; otherwise false.
